text: Usuk Yallay kaak sa nummah qibaadá cakkisita yalli kak aneewaa kinni, usuk amoytay ginó inkih yamlike, kulli boolak saytunnooweh, kulli qaybik nagaynan le, Isi ambiyaa kee isi farmoytit Nummaysé (mugqjizal) usuk isi ginoh taamoomi dacrise (loynise) kinni, Maysoliy kak ayse waana kinni, Dirkisey naqoosa inkih kah Rammitta kinni, Kaxxiina liy kaxxiina cakkisita kinni, yalli agleh kaat hayya haytaamak saytunnooweh
